Row.Text: The cauldron is the sea, and the materials are the earth.
Sorry to keep you waiting. I am Plachta, the alchemist you're here to see.
Sorry to keep you waiting. I am Plachta, the alchemist you're here to see.
Sorry to keep you waiting. I am Plachta, the alchemist you're here to see.
Whatever the case, if something is standing in our way, it is certainly not our friend.
Diplomacy does not seem to be getting us anywhere.
I... was not even close. I still have a long way to go, it seems...
That is what I hoped for!
